net.openhft.chronicle.hash.replication

Interface ConnectionListener


  • public interface ConnectionListener

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onConnect(SocketAddress address, byte identifier, boolean isServer) 
      void onDisconnect(SocketAddress address, byte identifier) 

    • Method Detail

      • onConnect

        void onConnect(SocketAddress address,
             byte identifier,
             boolean isServer)
        Parameters:
        address - the address that we are connceted to
        identifier - the remote identifier that we are not connected to.
        isServer - if this host accepted the connection isServer is true, if we made the connection to a remote host then isServer is false

      • onDisconnect

        void onDisconnect(SocketAddress address,
                byte identifier)
        Parameters:
        address - the address that we have been disconnected from
        identifier - the identifer the address that we have been disconnected from or Byte .MIN_VALUE if not known
